titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Stephen Fairchild papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Graduate student at Wayne State University.
archdesc.scopecontent: A collection of correspondence sent to Stephen Fairchild in regard to his research on William Francis "Frank" Murphy, for his unfinished disertation about Murphy. Included here are letters from sholars and individuals who knew Murphy personally: Irene Murphy, Hazel Littlefield Smith, Mrs. Nell B. Wilson, Josephine GomonFrank M. McHale, Eleanor M. Bumgardner, Harold Titus, Frank L. Riordan, among others. Also incoming correspondence from archivists and officials at various institutions. The collection includes a few photographs of Fairchild, as well as newspaper clippings that make mention of Murphy.
